clause.title: Standard implicit conversions
clause.paragraph: The following implicit conversions are classified as standard implicit conversions: Identity conversions (13.1.1) Implicit numeric conversions (13.1.2) Implicit reference conversions (13.1.4) Boxing conversions (13.1.5) Implicit constant expression conversions (13.1.6)
The standard implicit conversions specifically exclude user-defined implicit conversions.
